summary:
This mod adds 7 custom voice followers.
This follower mod is STANDALONE.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/KdJe5ui.png[/img]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]■About this mod[/u][/size][/color][b][size=5]
[/size][/b][color=#ff0000][size=4]
##Required DLC:Dragonborn！##[/size][/color][b][size=5]
[/size][/b]
This mod adds 7 Japanese custom voice  followers.
This follower mod is STANDALONE.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/4eKUEz3.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/vWQfNNw.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wEvwrNQ.png[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/48fzJXu.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/LuCjHxH.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6mzhNwG.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/YqCZZLJ.png[/img]

Marriage supported　：　Sela,Noemie,Rosalie,Natasha
Unmarried　　　　　：　Airi,Noela,Cecile

[youtube]sWNW7eRkbKs[/youtube]


[youtube]Rp-Hi5lrR4s[/youtube]


[color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]■Conversation events between followers[/u]
[/size][/color]
・When employing this MOD followers, they will introduce themselves and random conversations with each other.
  If you hire them, you can let each other introduce themselves from the conversation menu.
  After introducing ourselves, they will have a random conversation with each other in the way of adventure.

・Currently, the combinations where this conversation function is valid are as shown in the table below.

[img]https://i.imgur.com/4jhuXVu.jpg[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/66abDf3.png[/img]
  ※ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69224/?]Balin[/url] (other author's MOD).
  ※ [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76823/]Alfred[/url](other author's MOD).
  ※ [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75299]Risa[/url](other author's MOD).
  ※[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82999] Hana[/url](other author's MOD).
  ※[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82999]Vivi[/url](other author's MOD).


[youtube]ogc9HQsAT4g[/youtube]

[youtube]T3clG8ERY_c[/youtube]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5][youtube]w0RYARXAZd4[/youtube]
[u]■Healer function(Sela,Noemie,Noela)[/u]
[/size][/color]
・Sela and Noemie, Noela are healers.
  They use recovery magic for players and followers.
  You can set conditions and targets of recovery magic on the conversation menu.

・Sela and Noemie can treat the disease of the player.
  Treatment of diseases can be done from the conversation menu.


[color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]■Traveler function(Airi)
[/u][/size][/color]
 ・After Airi's  self-introduction, She starts to move between cities .
   After her self-introduction, please talk to other followers.
   You can join the other followers to the team of Airi.
   (Maximum number of people is up to four people)
   They will follow the Airi.

[youtube]ZlTeYkXnVGk[/youtube]

　[img]https://i.imgur.com/bMQv9OZ.png[/img]

[color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]■Friendly fire prevention function(Rosalie ＆Natashaa＆Noela)
[/u][/size][/color]
・Rosalie  and Natasha,Noela fight with destructive magic, so friendly fires tend to occur.
  →In this MOD, functions to prevent this tendency are prepared.　
     Talk to other followers when you are hiring Rosary or Natasha or Noela.
     You can choose settings to prevent their Friend Fire.


[color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]■ENB used for SS
[/u][/size][/color]　　・[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451/]Snapdragon Prime ENB[/url] by [b]tetrodoxin[/b]
